name: Pigeon Flap
description:
!DISCLAIMER! This was not made as a serious release but just for a bit of fun. So dont expect great things or perfect tiling(Because it's not!) Also, all the art was done on microsoft paint so it looks... as you might expect!

Pigeon Flap is a very short, MILDLY infuriating vertical flappy bird-type game. Only took about a day to make (with breaks inbetween). All I can say is I hope you enjoy it and happy raging. (If your as bad as I am!)  

:)
